NK001(ka)008:1: / skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa lag tu blang nas rim par klog pa'i thabs ni //
NK001(ka)008:4: skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa zhes pa'i bar barjoda rjes /
NK001(ka)008:6: e ma hoh rang gnas 'og min nas /
NK001(ka)008:10: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK001(ka)008:12: ngan song gsum dang 'gro ba lnga'i //
NK001(ka)008:13: sdug basngala ma lus sel mdzad cing //
NK001(ka)008:14: sogs sh+loo ka gcig dpal jo bo a ti sha'i-skyabs
NK001(ka)008:15: 'gro bstan pa'i mchod spyod du gsungs pa 'di dang
NK001(ka)008:16: lhan cig barjoda bzhin phyag gang mang byas rjes /
NK001(ka)008:18: mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa //
NK001(ka)008:22: ston pa bla med sangs rgyas rin po che //
NK001(ka)008:24: thabs mkhas thugs rjes sh+aakya'i rigs su 'khrungs //
NK001(ka)008:26: mdzad pa bcu gnyis barjoda rjes /
NK001(ka)008:27: zag med kyi chos sde nyer gcig mdo rgyan nas gsungs pa go rim mi 'dra ba /
NK001(ka)008:28: skyabs 'gro 'di bshad pa'i dbang du byas shing /
NK001(ka)008:29: phar phyin drug gis bstod pa nas /
NK001(ka)008:30: dkon mchog rjes dran dang sbyar nas bshad pa'i go rim yin pas de rnams ltar barjoda rjes /
NK001(ka)008:31: smra bsam barjoda med shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK001(ka)008:33: 'jam dbyangs phyag na rdo rje spyan ras gzigs //
NK001(ka)008:35: thub pas bka' bsgos bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
NK001(ka)008:37: gnas brtan chen po bcu drug la phyag 'tshal /
NK001(ka)008:39: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK001(ka)008:40: ji nyed su dag sogs nas /
NK001(ka)008:41: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bsto. //
NK001(ka)008:44: skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa bshad //
NK001(ka)008:48: rkang pa gcig po 'di lan gsum barjoda rjes /
NK001(ka)008:49: sems can thams cad bde ba dang //
NK001(ka)008:50: bde ba'i rgyu dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK001(ka)008:51: sogs sh+loo ka lan gsum barjoda rjes //
NK001(ka)008:53: kun tu yang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa chen po'o //
NK001(ka)008:55: bdun cu pa las gsungs pa /
NK001(ka)008:56: yon tan dam pa re re bzhin //
NK001(ka)008:59: 'di nas nyi ma lho nub ma barjoda rjes /
NK001(ka)008:60: ma lus sems can sogs dang /
NK001(ka)008:61: bde gshegs snying pos 'gro ba yongs la khyab /
NK001(ka)008:63: bcom ldan 'dir ni byon pa legs //
NK001(ka)008:64: sogs kyis bzhugs su gsol rjes /
NK001(ka)008:65: gnas gsum bsten pa'i yul de la //
NK001(ka)008:70: {bas 'dir mchod pa byin rlabs bya zhing mchod pa'i sprin gyis gzungs 'don /
NK001(ka)008:72: me tog dam pa sogs bzang spyod yan lag bdun pa tshang bar barjoda rjes /
NK001(ka)008:73: blang ba dang por shes bya ba //
NK001(ka)008:74: 'jigs pa byung tshe bskul ma yin //
NK001(ka)008:76: bdag ming 'di sogs rgyu'i skyabs 'gro gang mang grub rjes /
NK001(ka)008:77: byang chub ltung bshags kyi rgyu'i skyabs 'gro /
NK001(ka)008:79: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK001(ka)008:82: lan gsum rjes gzhung thams cad barjoda rjes /
NK001(ka)008:84: mi mchog rgyal ba sogs sh+loo ka de grangs gsog par bya'o //
NK001(ka)008:85: thun 'jog khar don dam skyabs 'gro la mnyam par bzhag cing rjes su /
NK001(ka)008:86: rgyud la shes bya sogs nas /
NK001(ka)008:89: ga chen tshul la sogs sh+loo ka barjoda mthar /
NK001(ka)008:90: sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang /
NK001(ka)008:91: sogs 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi smon lam nyi shu pa 'don par bya'o //
NK001(ka)008:92: ces pa 'adi'anga dpal gyi seng+gesa sbyar ba'o //
